#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	
	string encode = "", decode = "";
	while(getline(cin,encode))
	{
		//decode = "";
		for(int i = 0; i < encode.length(); i++)
			if(encode[i] == 'a' || encode[i] == 'e' || encode[i] == 'i' || encode[i] == 'o' || encode[i] == 'u')
				encode.erase(i,2);
		cout << encode << endl;
	}//end while
	
	return 0;
	
}//end main
